meanings.definition: A person who owns and leases land, buildings, or dwelling units to others.
meanings.sent1: The landlords collect rent from the tenants every month.
meanings.sent2: My landlords fixed the leaky faucet in the bathroom promptly.
meanings.sent3: The landlords decided to throw a party for all their tenants.
meanings.sent4: The landlords are the gatekeepers of the rental property kingdom.
meanings.sent5: The landlords are like the shepherds of the housing flock.

meanings.definition: The owner or manager of a rental property.
meanings.sent1: Our landlords are responsible for maintaining the building.
meanings.sent2: The landlords are always available to address any issues we have.
meanings.sent3: The landlords dressed up as superheroes for Halloween.
meanings.sent4: The landlords are the captains steering the ship of our apartment complex.
meanings.sent5: The landlords are the protectors of our peaceful living environment.
